reviewText:
I liked the most you could see the punches pretty well.  I liked the least it does not have an announcer to explain
scores at the end of rounds there is not much verbal explanation of anything to do with the actual fight.  It would be a great
 thing if they would make it possible to see at least part of the fight in slow motion,  but that is not the case.

A nice set of fights from an era of 'The Mongoose.'
I am an avid fight fan from the early fight greats.
Incredible how many fights he fought. And,a master pugilist.
